item.description:
Just got this invitation to a free screening of Win Win. I know how we all like FREE movies!

Screenings tend to fill up early (we're not the only group that is invited), so I suggest meeting at 6:00 for the 7:00 showing.

This is a NoOrg, meaning that an organizer isn't necessarily going to attend. So it's up to you, collectively, to self-organize. You need to print a pass before you head to the theater, as tickets are not sold for this showing. (See details below.)

Enjoy the show!

-Dana

-------------------

Fox Searchlight Pictures cordially invites The Framingham Movie Meetup group to an advance screening of WIN WIN in Framingham on Wednesday, March 9th.  
 
The hit movie from this year's Sundance Film Festival, WIN WIN, explores the depths and nuances of human relationships and the bonds between unlikely characters. It is a feel-good uplifting comedy full of terrific performances and smart humor from Paul Giamatti, Amy Ryan, Bobby Cannavale, Jeffrey Tambor, and  
introducing New Jersey-state wrestling champion, Alex Shaffer.  
 
Feel free to pass this information along to other members, friends and family. If you would like to share this information on Facebook or Twitter, you can use the shortened URL:  
http://bit.ly/f9ejzw 
 
Please see the details below for directions on how to receive free tickets.  
 
Movie Screening Details 
============================== 
Wednesday, March 9th, 7:00 PM 
Framingham, MA 
 
TO DOWNLOAD A SCREENING PASS 
1) Go to http://www.gofobo.com/rsvp 
2) Enter RSVP Code: SXYMFMY8 
3) Print pass and attend screening. 
============================== 
 
*Please note - Tickets are complimentary, but remember to arrive early as screenings are always overbooked to ensure a full theater. Seating is first come-first served, and is not guaranteed.  
  
 
THIS FILM IS RATED R 
 
WIN WIN 
Release:                                                  March 25, 2011 
Directed by:                                             Tom McCarthy 
Screenplay by:                                         Tom McCarthy 
Story by:                                                  Tom McCarthy & Joe Tiboni    
Produced by:                                           Mary Jane Skalski, Michael London, Lisa MariaFalcone, Tom McCarthy 
Cast:                                                        
Paul Giamatti, Bobby Cannavale, Amy Ryan, Jeffrey Tambor 
  
Tom McCarthy, acclaimed writer/ director of THE VISITOR and THE STATION AGENT, explores the allegiances and bonds between unlikely characters with a lighter touch in his new film.   
 
Struggling attorney Mike Flaherty (Paul Giamatti), who volunteers as a high school wrestling coach, secretly takes on the guardianship of an elderly client in an attempt to help keep his practice and his family afloat. When the client’s teenage grandson runs away from home and shows up on his grandfather’s doorstep, Mike’s life is turned upside down.   
 
A win-win arrangement turns into something much more complicated than he ever bargained for.  McCarthy’s deft touch balancing drama and comedy, broken hearts and poignant humanity is at play in WIN WIN.
item.name: Free Screening/No Org -- Win Win
